meaningMnemonic: Each <radical>life</radical> has a <radical>soul</radical>, and that soul determines what <kanji>gender</kanji> you are. It's not so much about your body parts, it's more about what's inside that matters.
readingMnemonic: Once you've decided what your <kanji>gender</kanji> is, the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう) comes to your house, lays his <reading>sa</reading>ber (せい) on your shoulders, and then it's official! It's in all the newspapers, there's a parade, and everyone is patting you on the back because you did it!
